bitprim
=======

Bitcoin (and Litecoin) development platform for Python applications

Getting started 
---------------

.. code-block:: bash

    $ pip install bitprim

Reference documentation
-----------------------

For more detailed documentation, please refer to `<https://www.bitprim.org/>`_.
